title: 1914 B18 Blanket Wheat SOLD HOF Blue Infield
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: 1914 B18 Blanket Wheat SOLD HOF Blue Infield
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a 1914 B18 Blanket of HOF outfielder Zach Wheat of the Brooklyn Dodgers. This is the tougher to find Blue Infield Variation. It has excellent registration, clarity, and color. His name is boldly printed and easy to read which is excellent for a blue infield. It has four 4 brown borders and looks terrific. Slight fading is apparent on the felt but in general and excellent condition item 
64.99 SOLD shipping with tracking net
